contentHtml:
Nested If

You can have if statements within if statements.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
<?php
    $x = 15;
    if ($x > 10) {
        echo "Greater than 10";
        if ($x > 20) {
            echo "Greater than 20";
        }
        else {
            echo "Less than 20";
        }
    }
?>
</body>

</html>
title: Nested If
